      public static final RegistryObject<Item> KATANA_NAME = ITEMS.register("katana_id", () -> new KatanaItem(TIER, ATTACK_DAMAGE, ATTACK_SPEED, DISTANCE, new Item.Properties(), CHANCE, new MobEffectInstance(EFFECT, EFFECT DURATION, EFFECT_LEVEL)));
